reviewText: A flash from the past.  Kinda like Scooby-Doo, some are a little scarey, but always end well.  Safe from cursing, but use parent supervision on darker episodes.  We just avoid those few that have occult influences (haunted houses).
I love these old shows and so does my sister. My older sister suffered a head trauma and lost a lot of her memory. This really helped her remember when she was younger.
Its a damaged item.  It does not work.  My son is very upset.  It is scratched.  We are very disappointed.
Finally Season 1 of the 70s tv series of the Hardy Boys!! I have the 3rd Season of this series DVD , but why no release on the 2nd Season????
I love watching the Hardy Boys again.  I hope I can get the rest of the seasons. I will keep looking.
